about_the_game:
Legendary Pilots is an indie flight simulator that doesn't pretend to be the most "realistic" flying game ever, but rather, it is a fun, stylised game centred on the pilot's career. It is being developed by someone who truly love aviation...

Unlike in any other flying game, the user experiences many other aspects of the flight, like dealing with routes and passengers, and buying and fixing their own planes in an immersive world.

. Retro-Gaming Vibes - Pixelated Style
. Progressive Pilot's Career
. Several flyable Turbo-Props and Regional Jets airplanes
. Immersive, fictional world
. Simplified Navigation System (Radio-Compass)
. Manageable Crew
. Economy System
. AI Air Traffic
. Competitive Air Companies Ranking

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.0, Ubuntu 18.04, Kernel 4.15 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500 or AMD X8 FX-8350 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 710 or AMD Radeon HD 8570D or higher
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
